website_summaries.verdict: Built for those workers who don't just travel but hustle from place to place.
pros: Functional briefcase that can organize large items for those on extended trips
Can be carried on most airplanes
Front pocket includes cable port so you can charge devices on the go

customer_reviews.title: Not for your regular traveler
customer_reviews.text: Poor design I purchased this spinner hoping it was a moble office as it claims 1st the space for the laptop fits up to 17" laptops but you have to struggle to get it in and out 2nd I headed off to the airport one thing I noticed you can't stack this on top of your carryon with the wheel design which brings me to the 3rd and most annoying problem this bag keep tipping over and over and over I couldn't wait for that trip to be over so I could return it and lastly on that 4 day trip and I noticed the sticking was already starting to fray this is not what Delsey Hope this was helpful
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hiles

customer_reviews.title: Product information.
customer_reviews.text: I really am very happy with this case. Its roomy it rolls smoothly, and I stuff mine to the hilt because for me it truely is my traveling office. The picture is desceptive, the handle is a full 2 feet tall so from floor to top of handle is 3 ft 4 inches. And it adjusts to shorten for the less tall person. I'm 5 ft 6 in and my son is 6 ft 7 in and this case is comfortable for either of us to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Tippy like most when full to capacity
customer_reviews.text: Great color and quality with nice pockets. Solid construction except the main part has flimsy removable pocket dividers (read: they do not separate areas at the bottom) that are functional enough but not as desired. As with most rolling briefcases if you fill it to capacity with laptop etc, it will easily tip forward- why can't anyone seem to build something more balanced? Pure physics and annoying if using it for more than a few folders, pens, and a featherweight laptop... since the laptop area is further forward than center of the wheels. My Chromebook is too much forward weight even with a full back compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Woods

customer_reviews.title: It moves around great, but found the stitching to the back packets ...
customer_reviews.text: It moves around great, but found the stitching to the back packets were unraveling. I probably should of returned it for an exchange. We liked the set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: she is a school teacher and love the mobility of it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this spinner for my wife; she is a school teacher and love the mobility of it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Caban Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Zipper for largest pocket hard to close
customer_reviews.text: After years of using Tumi (which I still love) I decided to move to a 4-wheel briefcase to give me more flexility. After one trip I was ready to return this case since the zipper for the large section, closest to the handle requires some assistance. However, I changed my mind after the second trip - it is getting easier. I anticipate using this rolling briefcase for about 1 year after which I will have to buy a new one - that particular zipper will most likely not hold up to my heavy use of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More an office than a carry-on but can be used either way
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I'd transport my teaching materials to school everyday but forgot that in the winter, I really can't wheel this from the parking lot to school as we battle snow cover. However, the bag looks great, has several file-like separators, and is excellent for carrying office/school materials. I used it as a carry-on twice and it was totally fine, but because of all the dividers, I felt like I was more limited. Notice that you can unsnap the file dividors, so it's still a good option for office and travel. It's a very nice looking bag. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Artisana

customer_reviews.title: Okay roller case for price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the roller case does the job....I have had other roller cases from other companies but this case has more of a tendency to tip over if the contents are not distributed equally compared to others. Also the side zippers are somewhat awkward to to zip up.
customer_reviews.author: ruth gallagher

customer_reviews.title: You need only one finger to move it forwards!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a physician 83 years old (but still practicing medicine part-time), I carry relatively heavy files and references back and forth ( home/office). I have tried several briefcases on wheals, found this to be the easiest one to handle and manouver.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bart

customer_reviews.title: Yeah for the Spinners
customer_reviews.text: Used for a recent flight & worked well although not a carry-on for American's smaller planes. Too crowded when put under seat, did not fit in overhead. Valet checked it on each of the 4 flights. Compartments worked well as did spinners which was the reason for the primary purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vol Fan

customer_reviews.title: My little R2D2
customer_reviews.text: My file box for documents that travel when I do. Rolls well on pile rugs. Zippers handle packed-full loads. Fits in overheads. Fits in closet. Fits in back seat. Easy to maneuver. Glad I purchased this one! For deterrent purposes, these locks fit in the zipper pulls:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good. Delivery was on time
customer_reviews.text: It is good. Delivery was on time. It does not topple over if not loaded excessively. Wheels are good and handle is still holding up. Have taken it for a few trips and works well at airports. This cannot be placed under the seat in many planes. It cannot be wheeled in rough pavements or roads as wheels are small. But works well for business.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: The Samsonite has a better interior but the handle has broken and would not ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok... so far the handle that I now don't take down and up. The Samsonite has a better interior but the handle has broken and would not stay up... maybe I never should have lowered it??
customer_reviews.author: Judi Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Bag size
customer_reviews.text: Find the luggage bag too bulky. It could be made slimmer by taking away the 'clothing' section or reduce this portion. Being bulky, it's cumbersome to take it up and down and onboard public transport like buses and trains. I use it for transporting my office stuff including a laptop for my business especially for business presentations, so I do not need this clothing compartment. Other than this, the bag is useful and meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lim Larry

customer_reviews.title: Heavy lift but nicely organized
customer_reviews.text: I like the file system. It is well organized but it is heavy. I really can’t use it like I thought I would because it is cumbersome to lift in my car and up stairs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Easy access
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a work bag. I am so happy with how wide it opens. I can fit my computer, scanner, cords, books, papers in my Delsey. It is accessible & very organized. I haven’t had it long enough to test the durability, however feels like it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Bad Zippers.
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are cheap which makes it hard to open and close, especially the main compartment. Would also like a pocket in the front for documents or a passport.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer977

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an overnight trip or a day at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an overnight trip or a day at the office. I love the 4 spinners. Opportunity to improve would be easier laptop slide out for security at airport but I don't travel that much so not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: KSaving1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome luggage
customer_reviews.text: Being used by my college student. All her computers, books and supplies fit comfortably and she has gotten complimented on how professional the luggage looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for daily usage
customer_reviews.text: The pop up handle does not stay in place when you are pulling the bag around. Too much money spent for an item with a poor quality handle when used regularly
customer_reviews.author: gardengirl2

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for school. I have large books and supplies. It fits well. It has multiple compartments to fit stuff in.
customer_reviews.author: PHarris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It falls forward easily if you put a computer in the computer pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Liotta

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bag but I wish it had straps.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous bag and I absolutely love how smooth the wheels move along a surface. It is so easy to manuever. The only thing I wish it had is a strap to pick it up when you have to go up stairs or if you’re standing and need to get something out of the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how compact and yet spacious this is
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact and yet spacious this is. Very nice looking and still meets my space needs, rolls well and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Laptop Bag for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and roomy laptop bag with lots of pockets for computer accessories. I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hoard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot and easy to maneuver around the airport!
customer_reviews.author: Bill from Airmont, NY

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: This mobile office meets my needs . I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R. Beto

customer_reviews.title: Problem solver.
customer_reviews.text: Needed, resolved my health issues after surgery. Great price, great item. Extremely funtional.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible it does not stand after a couple of months. Don’t buy it !
customer_reviews.author: Ana Paula Montanha Dias

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great for work. Wheels easily and holds my files from one office to the other. Also looks great.
customer_reviews.author: herjoy54

customer_reviews.title: Read the 1 Start Reviews - They Are True
customer_reviews.text: I love Delsey luggage so I didn't pay attention to the 1-star reviews - I really wish I had for all the reasons they have listed. I have tried this bag on several business trips this summer and it still isn't working like I had hoped. Uhnfortnately I am now outside the return/exchange window :(
customer_reviews.author: MBH

customer_reviews.title: Overall great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Overall great and easy to use. I wish it opened wider or more in the middle to access larger notebook/files.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and sturdy; plenty of pockets but nice open interior
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: My husband is very satisfied, he was able to get his computer
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very satisfied, he was able to get his computer, ipad and most of his papers in the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: The laptop pocket is rather snug but I just figure that makes it pretty secure. (I never have to worry about it ...
customer_reviews.text: The inside pockets are a little small, so if you have large school books: you’re going to need a backpack or to carry them. The laptop pocket is rather snug but I just figure that makes it pretty secure. (I never have to worry about it bumping around in there). The wheels are what is amazing!!! I can spin this, turn it, all with no problem. The material is nice and hasn’t gotten stained or anything. All in all: I wish it was a little larger, but I think this is supposed to be more for business trips than college students. You can definitely fit a few outfits, notebooks, pens, and a laptop in here with no problema.
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only used it a month and it doesn’t stand ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it a month and it doesn’t stand up straight and the handle is very wobbly. It falls over and the wheels stick.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander LaBranche

customer_reviews.title: Handle was broke and inside of the case was filthy ...
customer_reviews.text: Handle was broke and inside of the case was filthy. The case in not able to be used at all
customer_reviews.author: Pddiddy94

customer_reviews.title: Good Breif Spinner
customer_reviews.text: None of the issues reported by the last review. It is simple and easy to organize. One of the few reasonable lightweight brief case spinners on the market. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: dean greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Handy carryon
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses this bag for carryon purposes. Holds his books, computer and travel necessities well.
customer_reviews.author: Ptskas

product_meta.title: DELSEY Paris 4 Wheel Spinner Mobile Laptop Briefcase, Black, One Size
product_meta.description: Color:BlackDelsey's Mobile Office is made exclusive for Amazon, and features professional styling and innovative organization for the business person on the go. This bag is very durable, made from twisted polyester with rubberized corners to minimize impact at key stress points. Two front pockets and a large main compartment provide easy access to files, electronics, office supplies and travel necessities. Four double spinner wheels, top carry handle, telescoping trolley handle make maneuvering this case a breeze. Easily fit this case in the overhead compartment of most domestic airlines. Worldwide limited 10 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Four double spinner wheels, telescoping handle and top carry handle for superior maneuverability.
Front pocket includes cable port and a dedicated neoprene sleeve for power bank to charge electronics on the go, as well as an organizer for office supplies.
Middle pocket includes zippered mesh pocket, neoprene sleeve for tablet as well as a padded sleeve for up to a 15.6" laptop.
Main compartment features file folder organizer, tie down straps at rear for personal items and two more mesh pockets to keep your items organized.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars60 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
